newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean firms to seek rapemeal, wheatbran pellet.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean firms to seek rapemeal, wheatbran pellet.

text.p: South Korean feed milling companies have invited tenders for 26,500 tonnes of rapeseed meal and 36,000 tonnes of wheatbran pellet by 11:00 a.m. (0200 GMT) on Tuesday, traders said on Monday.
They said the rapeseed meal tenders were split into two positions -- one for 12,000 tonnes for arrival by May 20 and the other for 14,500 tonnes for arrival by June 20.
The wheatbran pellet tenders were also divided into two positions -- one for 18,000 tonnes for arrival by May 20 and the remaining of 18,000 tonnes for arrival by June 20.
Arrival was set to the port of Inchon.
